title: Ko Olina Senior Invitational
text: The Ko Olina Senior Invitational was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Champions%20Tour">Champions Tour</a> played only in 1992. It was played in <a href="Ewa%20Beach%2C%20Hawaii">Ewa Beach, Hawaii</a> at the <a href="Ko%20Olina%20Golf%20Club">Ko Olina Golf Club</a>. The purse for the tournament was US$500,000, with $75,000 going to the winner, <a href="Chi-Chi%20Rodr%C3%ADguez">Chi-Chi Rodríguez</a>.
